about_the_game:
"CongWei" is a sweet and romantic otome visual novel game. After you and CongWei are struck by lightning radiation, your body turns into a power bank, and Quark Power Company CEO CongWei needs your body to charge him to stay alive. You must get married immediately... Now, start your own exclusive, blush-inducing, heart-throbbing electric romance!

▌Game Content
-Over 1,000 stunning 3D scenes
-Full voice acting and sound effects for all characters
-Collect CongWei’s heartbeat, temperature, and breath to unlock his different rooms and find clues to solve the love-charging problem
-Unlock 10 interactive features, including phone calls, messages, companionship, and even bedtime stories from CongWei
-10 side stories in addition to the main plot, with different choices leading to various endings
-Unlock 3 fun mini-games related to electricity
-Unlock 10 theme songs
-100,000 words of sweet and romantic text

▌The Romance
You are a kind-hearted nun. When Quark Power Company's CEO, CongWei, was framed by villains and imprisoned, you visited the prison to preach and encouraged him. He fell deeply in love with you. After his release, CongWei rebuilt his business and attended weekly services. On a rainy night, while volunteering to repair the church's roof cross due to his electrical expertise, he was struck by lightning. At the critical moment, he held you tightly. While embracing each other, the lightning radiation caused bodily mutations. Since then, your body has become a power bank, and he needs your body as a power source. The only way for him to survive is to rely on you, so you must marry immediately...

▌The Power CEO and You



CongWei / CEO of Quark Power Company, wise, diligent, loyal, and devoted.
When he was down and out in prison, he fell in love with you because you offered him encouragement and care in the darkness. After marriage, CongWei repays you with a life of abundance, and he feels heartbroken that you must use your delicate body to charge him. During every charging session, he worries about hurting you. He cherishes you as a precious gift from God, treating you with utmost love and care.

You / A kind and pure-hearted nun. After leaving the convent, you live independently, vowing to God to do good deeds and help others throughout your life. You marry CongWei solely to charge him and sustain his life. Completely naive about matters between men and women, you are shy and timid, always afraid of making mistakes and causing trouble for CongWei during charging. You loyally and devoutly admire, follow, and protect him.

▌Gameplay
Watch the Story/Make Choices: Enjoy the movie-like storyline and advance your love story, starting with marriage and growing into true love. Collect his smiles, heartbeat, warmth, and more to unlock different rooms and find clues to solve the mystery.
Mini-Games: Complete electricity-themed mini-games to collect important puzzle pieces and solve the mystery.
Daily Interaction and Companionship: Interact with him through phone calls, messages, and by reading his diary.
Songs and Video Clips: Listen to theme songs and relive important story moments.

▌1000 Princes Series
The 1000 Princes otome games are a series of heart-fluttering 3D visual novel romance games for women. Players can choose different princes to experience a gorgeous and sweet love story. Each app is named after a specific prince. Every prince cares for you, loves you, protects you, supports you, encourages you, and accepts you.
"1000 Princes" is a grand romantic series for women! It includes both a sweet and romantic otome game series and easy-to-understand multilingual learning e-books.

🍰 "1000 Princes" Otome Games: Available on STEAM and Google Play
📕 "1000 Princes" Multilingual Learning E-books: Available on Google Play
└ 🅿️ "1000 Princes" Developer "Ginyan's Multilingual Learning": Available on YouTube
🍒 "1000 Princes" Theme Songs: Available on YouTube
🌸 "1000 Princes" Official Website

▌About the Developer
Ginyan, I am an independent otome game developer and e-book author, creating foreign language learning books. I have a deep passion for computers and learning foreign languages. I use my own romance novels as game scripts, develop games using the Unity Engine and Naninovel, create character modeling and animations with iClone and CC, and utilize various AI tools for game development.
